meanings.sent1: She noticed a tiny tache on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The artist added a tache of red to the painting.
meanings.sent3: The tache on the wall looked like a smiley face.
meanings.sent4: The tache of sunlight peeked through the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The tache of paint made the wall look unique.

meanings.sent1: The tache on his shirt was hard to remove.
meanings.sent2: The carpet had a noticeable tache from the spilled juice.
meanings.sent3: She tried to blame the tache on the dog, but no one believed her.
meanings.sent4: The tache on her reputation was hard to erase.
meanings.sent5: The tache on the mirror distorted her reflection.

meanings.definition: A style of facial hair, typically a mustache
meanings.sent1: He decided to grow a tache for Movember.
meanings.sent2: The actor sported a stylish tache for his role.
meanings.sent3: The tache on his face made him look more mature.
meanings.sent4: Her father's tache tickled when he kissed her cheek.
meanings.sent5: The tache on the detective helped him look incognito.
